resources.string:
1. Generate a Confirm/Revoke transaction QRCode (following the ERC67 scheme)
2. Scan the transaction and verify the fields before confirming/revoking it

Reminder: The account of this application (found in the account section) must be one of the owners of the Multisig Wallet. The number of confirmations should be adjusted accordingly.
An error occured. Please try again!
The two PINs are not the same!
An error occurred that prevents the app from working. Please restart the app and try again!
